channel.title: CVE Feed for HasThemes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HasThemes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-23899|2024-08-02T10:42:26.927Z -- hasthemes -- extensions%20for%20cf7%20%28contact%20form%207%20database%2C%20conditional%20fields%20and%20redirection%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in HasThemes Extensions For CF7 plugin <= 2.0.8 versions leads to arbitrary plugin activation.

item.title: CVE-2023-23803|2024-08-02T10:42:25.907Z -- hasthemes -- justtables
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in HasThemes JustTables plugin <= 1.4.9 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-23804|2024-08-02T10:42:26.178Z -- hasthemes -- ht%20feed
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in HasThemes HT Feed plugin <= 1.2.7 versions.

item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in HasThemes Really Simple Google Tag Manager plugin <= 1.0.6 versions.
